# allowsMultipleSelection

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the user can select more than one document at a time.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsMultipleSelection: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Getting the user-selected document

- **delegate**: An object that acts as the delegate of the view controller.
- **UIDocumentPickerDelegate**: A set of methods for tracking when the user selects a document or destination, or cancels the operation.
- **directoryURL**: The initial directory that the document picker displays.
